net.gree.asdk.api.ui
Class ShareDialog

java.lang.Object
  AuthorizableDialog
      net.gree.asdk.api.ui.ShareDialog

public class ShareDialog
extends AuthorizableDialog

Class which represents the dialog for sending a Share message with an image.

When a share is completely sent, the result of the share sending for the sender are notified as JSON data.

Sample code: 
 Handler handler = new Handler() {
   public void handleMessage(Message message) {
     switch(message.what) {
       case ShareDialog.OPENED:
         Log.d("Share", "ShareDialog opened.");
         break;
       case ShareDialog.CLOSED:
         Log.d("Share", "ShareDialog closed.");
         Log.d("Share", "result:" + message.obj.toString());
         break;
     }
   }
 };

 ShareDialog dialog = new ShareDialog(Activity.this);
 dialog.setHandler(handler);

 TreeMap<String,Object> map = new TreeMap<String,Object>();
 map.put("message", "message of the share dialog");
 map.put("image", bitmap);
 dialog.setParams(map);
 dialog.show();

Author:
GREE, Inc.

Field Summary
static int CLOSED
           Handler event type which notified when share dialog is finished to close.
This event have additional parameter "message.obj" as share results in handler's message.
static int OPENED
          Handler event type which notified when share dialog is started to open.

setParams

public void setParams(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
Set optional parameter. Parameter is passed as TreeMap object.

Parameters:
params - TreeMap object which having the following keys as elements.
-message - message shown as shareDialog's message.
-image - bitmap object shown as shareDialog's screenshot.
